price: Then afterward, Allah will accept the repentance of whom He wills, for Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
